name: com.tributepage.freecodecamp

scripts.init:
npm install && mkdir sass && mkdir js && mkdir dist && echo 'npm-debug.log
node_modules/*
' > .gitignore && touch index.html && touch bower.json
scripts.css:watch: npm run css && node-sass --output-style compact sass/main.scss -o dist -w

description: A Tribute to Dr. Mossadegh: Iranian revolutionary prime minister
